question: Which among the following is not correctly matched? (Biological Institutes of India)
option1: National Institute of Immunology (NII) – New Delhi
option2: Centre for DNA Fingerprinting and Diagnostics (CDFD) – Hyderabad
option3: Institute of Bioresource and Sustainable Development (IBSD),- Imphal
option4: National Centre for Cell Science (NCCS) – Faridabad
answer: National Centre for Cell Science (NCCS) – Faridabad
explanation: National Centre for Cell Science (NCCS) is in Manesar, Gurgaon
